title: Trips: Turn Sessions into Adventures | Rivian Roamer
text:

 Your Rivian doesn't just take you on drives — it takes you on trips. Now Roamer Plus tracks them that way.Group your drive and charge sessions into a single trip and get the full picture: total distance, time behind the wheel, energy used, fuel saved, efficiency across the entire journey, and elevation profile — all in one view.Name your trips, see every session broken down day by day, and trace your route on the map. Whether it's a weekend getaway or a cross-country road trip, you'll know exactly how your Rivian performed.
